team.title: Directors, Director Nominees and Executive Officers

members.name: Long Chen
members.title: Chief Executive Officer, Chairman and Director
bio: Mr. Chen has been our chief executive officer and a member of our board of directors since our inception in August 2021. Mr. Chen is a successful entrepreneur and an experienced business executive manager. He has extensive experience in corporate strategy development, finance and acquisition, business operations and financial management. Before joining us, Mr. Chen founded Beijing Xiying Times Culture Group Co. Ltd. in 2019, an e-commerce based social media and entertainment online shopping company. Since 2017, Mr. Chen founded and worked as the chairman in Wuhan Love Food Agriculture Development Technology Co., Ltd., a social catering and ordering online platform company. From 2013 to present Mr. Chen founded and worked as the chairman in Jiangxi Oujiewei Technology Co., Ltd., an O2O online laundry company. Currently both Wuhan Love Food Agriculture Development Technology Co., Ltd. and Jiangxi Oujiewei Technology Co., Ltd. have no operations.

We believe that Mr. Chen is qualified to serve on our board of directors and as our chief executive officer because of his extensive knowledge and experience in capital market, business management and finance.

members.name: Xingyun (Tracy) Xu
members.title: Chief Financial Officer and Director
bio: Ms. Xu has been our chief financial officer and a member of our board of directors since our inception in August 2021. Ms. Xu has over 12 years of experience in accounting, corporate finance and capital markets. Before joining us, Ms. Xu has been serving as the general manager of Shenzhen Enesoon Clean Energy Investment Limited (“Shenzhen Enesoon”), being responsible for the company’s developing and operating of build-operate-transfer (“BOT”) assets engaged in clean energy industry. From April 2016 to December 2018, Ms. Xu served in Shenzhen Enesoon Technology Co., Ltd. as its vice president in charge of company’s investment, financing and public listing projects. From 2009 to April 2016, Ms. Xu worked as an auditor manager at KPMG Huazhen LLP, a member firm of KPMG global organization of independent member firms affiliated with KPMG International Limited, in charge of audit of financial statements. She also participated in financial due diligence, coordinated with various listed intermediaries (including the company, sponsors, domestic and foreign legal advisers, industry consultants, internal control consultants and appraisers) to promote the listing progress. Ms. Xu is experienced in reviewing the prospectus, financial information disclosure, forecast, etc.

Ms. Xu has also been the director of various new energy companies in the PRC. Currently, she is the director of Tangshan Yingda Aineng Clean Energy Co. Ltd., Shandong Yonghe Aineng Clean Energy Co. Ltd., Wuzhi County Enesoon Clean Energy Co. Ltd., and Qingdao Enesoon Low-Carbon Development Co. Ltd.

Ms. Xu is a certified public account (non-practitioner) certified by Chinese Institute of Certified Public Accountants (“CICPA”) and passed the securities and fund qualification examination in China. She holds a Master in financial management from Xiamen University.
We believe that Ms. Xu is well qualified to serve on our board of directors and our chief financial officer because of her extensive experience with investment, financing and accounting matters.

members.name: Michael Davidov
members.title: Independent Director Nominee*
bio: Mr. Davidov will serve as our Director upon the effectiveness of our registration statement on Form S-1, of which this prospectus forms a part. Mr. Davidov has more than 20 years of experience in the fields of investments and corporate finance. Since 2020, Mr. Davidov served as an independent consultant. In 2012, he co-founded and served as the chief investment officer at Middle Kingdom Value Fund and Global Value Partners, special situations fund on China related and global value investments. From April 2006 to July 2009, Mr. Davidov was part of the management team of Middle Kingdom Alliance Corp., a U.S. listed special purpose acquisition company that completed its merger with Pypo China Holdings (a Beijing-based cell phone distribution company) and later changed its name to Funtalk China Holdings Limited (Formerly Nasdaq: FTLK). From January 1999 to December 2009, Mr. Davidov was the director of corporate finance and portfolio manager at High Capital Funding, LLC/Generation Capital, a private equity/special situations fund, where he structured and made private investments in public entities (PIPE) investments as a principal. From 2018 to 2019, Mr. Davidov served as the audit committee chairman for Nutriband (Nasdaq: NTRB). He also served as the independent director of TradeUP Global Corporation, a then special purpose acquisition company listed on Nasdaq, from April 2021 to April 2022. Mr. Davidov received his Bachelor’s degree in Mathematics from Southern Illinois University and an MBA degree in finance from J. Mack Robinson School of Business at Georgia State University. Mr. Davidov is also a director nominee of Feutune Light Acquisition Corporation, a special purpose acquisition company to be listed on Nasdaq, and a director of Fortune Rise Acquisition Corporation, a special purpose acquisition company listed on Nasdaq.
We believe that Mr. Davidov qualifies as our director because of his experience in investments and corporate finance.
